DataFeatures.name: Belize
DataFeatures.corporate_income_tax:
5%

Corporate income tax:

  • 40% on petroleum operations
  • 1.75% : chargeable income > 3 million Belize dollars
  • 3%: chargeable income < 3 million Belize dollars

Business tax based on gross income:

  • 5% on foreign passive income
  • 1.75% - 6% on all other foreign income

DataFeatures.name: Panama
DataFeatures.public_register:
Depend

Public register of directors, not shareholders
DataFeatures.public_register_value: Public register of directors, not shareholders
DataFeatures.corporate_income_tax:
25%

Greater of:

  • 25% on net taxable income; or
  • 1.17% on gross taxable income

Branch remittance tax: 10% in addition to CIT

DataFeatures.name: Singapore
DataFeatures.offshore_exemption_value: Yes if not remitted to Singapore
DataFeatures.audited_accounts_value: Yes, but audit exemption is also available

DataFeatures.name: RAK (UAE)
DataFeatures.corporate_income_tax:
0%

Up to 55% for oil and gas exploration and production company

20% for branches of foreign banks

Except the above cases, No Corporate Tax in RAK.

DataFeatures.name: UK
DataFeatures.audited_accounts_value: Yes, but audit exemption is also available

local_tax_profile.transfer_tax_show_more: Transfer of real property tax: 5% or up to 12.5% with nonresidents

local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
On owner-occupied properties:
  • First $250,000 - Exempt
  • Between $250,000 to $500,000 - 3/4 of one percent.
  • On the portion over $500,000, the tax rate is 1% of the market value of the property.

On vacant land (owned by non-Bahamians):
  • First $7,000 of market value -$100
  • More than $7,000 - 2% of the market value

For commercial/other improved properties:
  • First $500,000 of market value - 1% of the market value;
  • On the portion over $500,000 - 2% of the market value.

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax:
Corporate income tax
Business tax based on gross income
local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
Corporate income tax:
  • 40% on petroleum operations
  • 1.75%: chargeable income > 3 million Belize dollars
  • 3%: chargeable income < 3 million Belize dollars

Business tax based on gross income:
  • 5% on foreign passive income
  • 1.75% - 6% on all other foreign income
local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
Based on annual rental value:
  • 12.5% on occupied properties
  • 2% on unoccupied properties
  • -> but not exceed 2% of market value of property

1% land tax on unimproved land
local_tax_profile.transfer_tax_show_more:
Transfer of land:
  • 5% to Belizean on whichever greater of consideration and land value in excess of BZD 20,000
  • 8% to all other person

initial_requirement.company_secretary: Yes, and can be of any nationality

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
Greater of:
  • 25% on net taxable income; or
  • 1.17% on gross taxable income

Branch remittance tax:
  • 10% in addition to CIT
local_tax_profile.sales_tax_show_more:
• 7% standard rate
  • 10% for accomodations and alcohol
  • 15% for tobacco
local_tax_profile.dividend_tax: No, but subject to withholding tax
local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
• 0 -0.7% for properties with primary residence status
  • 0 - 1% for all other properties without primary residence status
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• 5% on foreign-sourced profits
  • 10% on domestic profits
  • 20% in case of bearer shares

local_tax_profile.transfer_tax: Stamp duty at 7.5% for transfer of most property

local_tax_profile.capital_gain_tax: Nil if assets sold within 1 year from purchase
local_tax_profile.capital_gain_tax_show_more:
• Nil if assets sold within 1 year from purchase
  • Other cases: lessser of half of effective corporate income tax or 20%

local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
Land tax:
  • US$50 per year for a half acre or less
  • US$150 per year for between a half acre to less than an acre
  • US$50 per year for each additional half acre

annual_compliance.annual_return: Company with over USD 4mil of revenue or USD 2mil of assets would be required to file annual return

local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
No withholding tax on dividend
Other types: 15% - 20%

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
• 8.25% for the first 2mil HKD
  • 16.5% for above
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
With Royalties payment derived from "an associate":
  • 15% to non-resident individuals
  • 8.25% - 16.5% to non-resident corporations

With Royalties payment not derived from "an associate":
  • 30% of the aforementioned rate

initial_requirement.company_secretary: Yes, and can be of any nationality

local_tax_profile.capital_gain_tax_show_more:
• 10% if sold within 12 months
  • 27% if sold over 12 months
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• 7.5% for insurance premium under a life policy
  • 15% for interest, royalties, mangement fees, fees for personal service, natural resource amount, or insurance premium under a contract other than a life policy
local_tax_profile.transfer_tax_show_more:
• Less than WST 50,000 - 1% of the property value
  • WST 50,000 to less than WST 100,000 - WST 500 + 2% of the excess above WST 50,000
  • WST 100,000 to less than WST 200,000 - WST 1,500 + 3% of the excess above WST 100,000
  • Equal to or more than WST 200,000 - WST 4,500 + 4% of the excess above WST 200,000

annual_compliance.audited_accounts: Yes, but audit exemption is available

local_tax_profile.offshore_tax_exemption: Yes if not remitted to Singapore
local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
• 0 - 16% to owner-occupied residential property
  • 10 - 20% to nonowner-occupied residential property
  • 10% to nonresidential property
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax: 0 - 22% for interests, royalties, and fees for technical services

local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• Dividends and interest paid to non-residents not subject to withholding tax
  • Royalties and fee for technical services paid to non-residents subject to rate ranging from 0 - 10%

legal_structure.legal_basic: Hybrid of common and civil law

annual_compliance.records_keeping: Yes, and required to file annual accounts

local_tax_profile.dividend_tax_show_more:
• Dividends paid by Mauritius resident companies is exempt from tax
  • Foreign-sourced dividends is subject to 15% tax rate, but also eligible for partial exemption on gross amount received.
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• 0% on dividends
  • 15% on interest paid to resident individuals,and non-residents
  • 10% on royalties received by residents, and 15% on non-residents
  • 10% on fees for technical services to non-residents

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
• 55% for oil and gas exploration and production company
  • 20% for branches of foreign banks
  • Above rates can varies under each Emirate
local_tax_profile.transfer_tax_show_more: The tax rate for transfer of real property varies depending on Emirate in which the property is located

legal_structure.legal_basic: Hybrid of Customary, Civil and Common law

initial_requirement.company_secretary: Yes, and doesn't need to reside in Jersey

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
• 0% standard rate
  • 10% or 20% to some specific activities
local_tax_profile.dividend_tax: Dividend received from a non-resident company will be exempt from tax
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• Dividends/Fees for technical services: 0%
  • Interest/Royalties: 0%, and can be subject to tax in certain case for payments to non-residents

legal_structure.legal_basic: Hybrid of Civil and Common law

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
• 25% on the first SR1mil taxable income
  • 33% applied to above amount
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax: 15% on dividends, interest, royalties paid to non-residents

annual_compliance.audited_accounts: Yes, but audit exemption is also available

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more:
• 19%
  • 25% for the year starting from 1 April 2023
local_tax_profile.capital_gain_tax_show_more:
For resident individuals:
Higher or additional rate taxpayer:
  • 28% on gains from residential property
  • 20% on gains from other chargeable assets

Basic rate taxpayer:
  • 18% on gains from residential property
  • 10% on gains from other chargeable assets

For Sole trader and partnership: 10%
For resident companies: subject to corporate taxation. Capital gain tax exemption can be availed upon meeting specific conditions.
local_tax_profile.dividend_tax_show_more:
To resident Individuals:
  • Tax-free dividend allowance: GBP 2,000
  • Basic rate: 7.5%
  • Higher rate: 32.5%
  • Additional rate: 38.1%

To resident UK company: mostly exempted whether received from local or foreign companies
local_tax_profile.property_tax_show_more:
Stamp duty land tax (SDLT) from 0 -12% for residential property
  • SDLT from 0 -5% for non-residential property
  • SDLT of 15% for residential property valued more than GBP 500,000 for companies
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax_show_more:
• Dividends / Fee for technical services: 0%
  • Interest/Royalties: 20% for payments paid to nonresidents

legal_structure.legal_basic: Hybrid of Civil law and communist legal theory

local_tax_profile.corporate_income_tax_show_more: 20% for annually income under 20 billion VND; 22% for above
local_tax_profile.dividend_tax:
5% (individual)
No dividend tax rate for Ltd, JSC
local_tax_profile.withholding_tax: Including VAT and Corporate Income Tax

local_tax_profile.sales_tax_show_more:
No sale tax
Gross Receipt Tax: 0.0945% to 1.9914%
local_tax_profile.dividend_tax_show_more:
For Individual (Resident):
* At State level: 0 - 6.6%
* At federal level:
- Ordinary Dividend Tax rate: 10 -37%
- Qualified Dividend Tax rate: 0 - 20%
For Individual (Non-Resident):
* At state level: 0 - 6.6%
At federeal level: 30%
local_tax_profile.property_tax: No (Real) Property tax at State level
